name: Bot Labs
description:
Bot Labs is an homage to the highly regarded game series Portal. You play as a robot participating in testing a new portal technology.

Use portals to solve classic and original puzzles and make you way to the end. There might even be cake...

Features
  • Portals and portalgun
  • 11 Puzzle rooms
  • Doors
  • Buttons
  • Cables
  • Cubes

Supports keyboard and mouse. Gamepad supported for main controls (excludes menus).
